import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react'; import { globalContext } from './context/Context'; function Card(movie) { let { api_key, base_url, url, get_data, setData, get_url, setUrl,img_path } = useContext(globalContext) return (
{movie.info.title}
{movie.info.vote_average}

{movie.info.overview}

) } export default Card
